00031 #include "BLI_math.h"
00032 
00033 #include "MEM_guardedalloc.h"
00034 
00035 #include "DNA_object_types.h"
00036 
00037 #include "BLI_array.h"
00038 
00039 #include "BKE_DerivedMesh.h"
00040 #include "BKE_bmesh.h"
00041 #include "BKE_tessmesh.h"
00042 
00043 /* main function for copying DerivedMesh data into BMesh */
00044 void DM_to_bmesh_ex(DerivedMesh *dm, BMesh *bm)
00045 {
00046     MVert *mv, *mvert;
00047     MEdge *me, *medge;
00048     MPoly /* *mpoly, */ /* UNUSED */ *mp;
00049     MLoop *mloop, *ml;
00050     BMVert *v, **vtable, **verts = NULL;
00051     BMEdge *e, **etable, **edges = NULL;
00052     float has_face_normals;
00053     BMFace *f;
00054     BMIter liter;
00055     BLI_array_declare(verts);
00056     BLI_array_declare(edges);
00057     int i, j, k, totvert, totedge /* , totface */ /* UNUSED */ ;
00058 
00059     /*merge custom data layout*/
00060     CustomData_bmesh_merge(&dm->vertData, &bm->vdata, CD_MASK_DERIVEDMESH, CD_CALLOC, bm, BM_VERT);
00061     CustomData_bmesh_merge(&dm->edgeData, &bm->edata, CD_MASK_DERIVEDMESH, CD_CALLOC, bm, BM_EDGE);
00062     CustomData_bmesh_merge(&dm->loopData, &bm->ldata, CD_MASK_DERIVEDMESH, CD_CALLOC, bm, BM_LOOP);
00063     CustomData_bmesh_merge(&dm->polyData, &bm->pdata, CD_MASK_DERIVEDMESH, CD_CALLOC, bm, BM_FACE);
00064 
00065     totvert = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00066     totedge = dm->getNumEdges(dm);
00067     /* totface = dm->getNumPolys(dm); */ /* UNUSED */
00068 
00069     /* add crease layer */
00070     BM_data_layer_add(bm, &bm->edata, CD_CREASE);
00071     /* add bevel weight layers */
00072     BM_data_layer_add(bm, &bm->edata, CD_BWEIGHT);
00073     BM_data_layer_add(bm, &bm->vdata, CD_BWEIGHT);
00074 
00075     vtable = MEM_callocN(sizeof(void**) * totvert, "vert table in BMDM_Copy");
00076     etable = MEM_callocN(sizeof(void**) * totedge, "edge table in BMDM_Copy");
00077 
00078     /*do verts*/
00079     mv = mvert = dm->dupVertArray(dm);
00080     for (i = 0; i < totvert; i++, mv++) {
00081         v = BM_vert_create(bm, mv->co, NULL);
00082         normal_short_to_float_v3(v->no, mv->no);
00083         v->head.hflag = BM_vert_flag_from_mflag(mv->flag);
00084 
00085         CustomData_to_bmesh_block(&dm->vertData, &bm->vdata, i, &v->head.data);
00086 
00087         /* add bevel weight */
00088         BM_elem_float_data_set(&bm->vdata, v, CD_BWEIGHT, (float)mv->bweight / 255.0f);
00089         vtable[i] = v;
00090     }
00091     MEM_freeN(mvert);
00092 
00093     /*do edges*/
00094     me = medge = dm->dupEdgeArray(dm);
00095     for (i = 0; i < totedge; i++, me++) {
00096         e = BM_edge_create(bm, vtable[me->v1], vtable[me->v2], NULL, FALSE);
00097 
00098         e->head.hflag = BM_edge_flag_from_mflag(me->flag);
00099 
00100         CustomData_to_bmesh_block(&dm->edgeData, &bm->edata, i, &e->head.data);
00101         etable[i] = e;
00102 
00103         /* add crease */
00104         BM_elem_float_data_set(&bm->edata, e, CD_CREASE, (float)me->crease / 255.0f);
00105         /* add bevel weight */
00106         BM_elem_float_data_set(&bm->edata, e, CD_BWEIGHT, (float)me->bweight / 255.0f);
00107     }
00108     MEM_freeN(medge);
00109 
00110     /*do faces*/
00111     mp = dm->getPolyArray(dm);
00112     mloop = dm->getLoopArray(dm);
00113     has_face_normals = CustomData_has_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_NORMAL);
00114     for (i = 0; i < dm->numPolyData; i++, mp++) {
00115         BMLoop *l;
00116 
00117         BLI_array_empty(verts);
00118         BLI_array_empty(edges);
00119 
00120         BLI_array_growitems(verts, mp->totloop);
00121         BLI_array_growitems(edges, mp->totloop);
00122 
00123         ml = mloop + mp->loopstart;
00124         for (j = 0; j < mp->totloop; j++, ml++) {
00125 
00126             verts[j] = vtable[ml->v];
00127             edges[j] = etable[ml->e];
00128         }
00129 
00130         f = BM_face_create_ngon(bm, verts[0], verts[1], edges, mp->totloop, FALSE);
00131 
00132         if (!f)
00133             continue;
00134 
00135         f->head.hflag = BM_face_flag_from_mflag(mp->flag);
00136         f->mat_nr = mp->mat_nr;
00137 
00138         l = BM_iter_new(&liter, bm, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, f);
00139 
00140         for (k = mp->loopstart; l; l = BM_iter_step(&liter), k++) {
00141             CustomData_to_bmesh_block(&dm->loopData, &bm->ldata, k, &l->head.data);
00142         }
00143 
00144         CustomData_to_bmesh_block(&dm->polyData, &bm->pdata, i, &f->head.data);
00145 
00146         if (has_face_normals) {
00147             float *fno;
00148 
00149             fno = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->pdata, &f->head.data, CD_NORMAL);
00150             copy_v3_v3(f->no, fno);
00151         }
00152     }
00153 
00154     MEM_freeN(vtable);
00155     MEM_freeN(etable);
00156 
00157     BLI_array_free(verts);
00158     BLI_array_free(edges);
00159 }
00160 
00161 /* converts a cddm to a BMEditMesh.  if existing is non-NULL, the
00162  * new geometry will be put in there.*/
00163 BMEditMesh *DM_to_editbmesh(DerivedMesh *dm, BMEditMesh *existing, int do_tessellate)
00164 {
00165     BMEditMesh *em = existing;
00166     BMesh *bm;
00167 
00168     if (em) {
00169         bm = em->bm;
00170     }
00171     else {
00172         bm = BM_mesh_create(&bm_mesh_allocsize_default);
00173     }
00174 
00175     DM_to_bmesh_ex(dm, bm);
00176 
00177     if (!em) {
00178         em = BMEdit_Create(bm, do_tessellate);
00179     }
00180     else {
00181         if (do_tessellate) {
00182             BMEdit_RecalcTessellation(em);
00183         }
00184     }
00185 
00186     return em;
00187 }
00188 
00189 BMesh *DM_to_bmesh(DerivedMesh *dm)
00190 {
00191     BMesh *bm;
00192 
00193     bm = BM_mesh_create(&bm_mesh_allocsize_default);
00194 
00195     DM_to_bmesh_ex(dm, bm);
00196 
00197     return bm;
00198 }
